name: The Gateway Trilogy
detailed_description:
The Gateway Trilogy is an award-winning minimalist adventure game series with a simple premise: guide a character through a series of rooms. Solve puzzles to advance.

Part 1 and 2 have been completely remastered with enhancements to sound, gameplay and visuals. The puzzles have been tweaked and changed, though the games still retain their core experience. If you've never played Gateway I or II before, this is the best way to experience them. If you've already played them, don't miss the chance to experience them again in this new and improved package.

Part 3 is a completely new addition, with never before released content.

Key Features

  • Puzzles: Solve tricky puzzles in an abstract minimalist void
  • Remastered: Appreciate the reworked music, gameplay and visuals
  • Trilogy: Enjoy an entirely new part of the quietly unsettling Gateway saga
  • Story: Experience strange and ambiguous stories
  • Commentary: Listen to the creator's outline the choices behind the game's design
